artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Yamamotoya Heikichi
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 246, horizontal ōban #28.3
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 峯あまた　こへて越路に　まつちかき　堅田になびき　おつるかりかね {Mine amata/ koete koshiji ni/ mazu chikaki/ Katada ni nabiki/ otsuru karigane}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Ōmi (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景之内)
title: Descending Geese at Katada
